Invocation Name: bible reading
des:
Listen daily to the Word of God with creative music and keep increasing your appetite for the Word. 

Keep us updated as without this, we won't be able to know how best to soothe you with all our skills. Thank you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
